H0.text: Hydrogen is the most abundant element in the universe.

H1.text: Oxygen is the most abundant element in the universe.

H2.text: Carbon is the most abundant element in the universe.

H3.text: Helium is the most abundant element in the universe.

A4.text: Hydrogen is the most abundant element in the Universe; helium is second.

A5.text: Oxygen has abundance rank 3, but atomic number 8.
